author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: jolly llb 2 box office: ‘Jolly LLB 2’ box-office collection Day 9
text:
Akshay Kumar 's 'Jolly LLB 2' earned Rs 5.50 crore (nett) on Saturday and took the total domestic collection to Rs 82 crore (nett), according to a report on boxofficeindia.com.
The film's producers also released their figures, which Quote: that the movie has earned Rs 6.35 crore on Saturday and the total domestic box-office collection stands at Rs 88.20 crore.
‘Jolly LLB 2’ box-office collection Day 8 Jolly LLB 2 box office collection: Akshay Kumar’s ‘Jolly LLB 2’ has managed to impress the audience and has been performing well at the box office.
'Jolly LLB 2' is the second instalment in the 'Jolly LLB' film series helmed by Subhash Kapoor. The 2013 film had Arshad Warsi and Boman Irani in lead roles and was a sleeper hit. For the second installment, director Subhash Kapoor chose Akshay to lead the cast while Huma Qureshi , Annu Kapoor and Saurabh Shukla essay prominent roles.
‘Jolly LLB 2’ box-office collection Day 7 Jolly LLB 2 collection: Akshay Kumar’s satire on India’s legal system ‘Jolly LLB 2’ earned approximately Rs 72.25 crore (nett) at the end of its first week, according to a report on Boxofficeindia.com. The film collected Rs 4.5 crore on Day 7 (Thursday).
'Jolly LLB 2' presents Akshay as Jagdishwar Mishra, an unscrupulous lawyer who turns over a new leaf after an unfortunate episode leaves him scarred. He sets out to seek justice at all costs while Annu Kapoor plays his rival lawyer. Akshay's performance has won him acclaim from the critics and audience alike.
